text: a. proposals on site allocations which exceed the capacity or height set out in the allocation; b. proposals for 500 or more homes on unallocated sites; or c. proposals for tall buildings on unallocated sites that exceed the height limits set out in policy PS2. 5. The council will support development proposals to be accompanied by design codes, setting out clear design expectations for the site that respond to its surrounding context and reflecting effective community engagement in their preparation. On site allocations in multiple ownership, the council will support development proposals to be accompanied by a joint design code for the site, developed in collaboration between the different landowners. 150 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text
